titles.title: Safer Truckers Act of 2025
Safer Truckers Act of 2025

A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to require that commercial driver's licenses be restricted to United States citizens, lawful permanent residents, and individuals authorized by U.S. Citizenship and Immigration Services to engage in employment in the United States that includes driving a commercial motor vehicle, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
